name: PKEraserTool
desc: A tool for erasing previously drawn content in a canvas view.

items.name: init(PKEraserTool.EraserType)
items.desc: Creates an eraser tool object that removes objects wholly or partially from a canvas view.

items.name: var eraserType: PKEraserTool.EraserType
items.desc: The behavior adopted by the eraser when deleting content.

items.name: enum PKEraserTool.EraserType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the behavior of the eraser.

items.name: static func == (PKEraserTool, PKEraserTool) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two eraser tools are the same.

items.name: static func != (PKEraserTool, PKEraserTool) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the two eraser tools arenâ€™t the same.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value representing this eraser tool.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Generates hash values into a hasher structure reference that you provide.

items.name: class PKEraserToolReference
items.desc: A tool for erasing previously drawn content in a canvas view.
